Title: The Shining
Introduction: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence.

Title: The Shawshank Redemption
Introduction: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

Title: The Truman Show
Introduction: An insurance salesman discovers his entire life is actually a TV show.

Title: Butterfly Effect
Introduction: A young man finds he can travel back in time to change his past.

Title: Inglourious Basterds
Introduction: A group of Jewish-American soldiers plan to assassinate Nazi leaders in occupied France.

Title: Coherence
Introduction: On the night of an astronomical anomaly, eight friends gather for a dinner party, but strange occurrences disrupt the evening.
